name: Newborn baby Pregnancy & Birth
description:
Do you love educational games and want to be a maternity doctor ?
If you want to play with a newborn baby you have found the right educational game !
Let's go to learn about pregnancy and birth !
Help the midwife to give birth to children !
This hospital is so much fun ! Let's be the best obstetric of the hospital !

This mom needs your help ! Choose among the main game or 4 mini games and let the fun begin!
Complete all the levels and dress up the newborn baby !
Play the role of a doctor, after the baby is born you will have to take care of him !
Can you help this Mommy ?

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination
in the world of newborns and infants.

Newborn baby - Pregnancy & Birth is simple and fun :
* Open the game and help mummy
* help to make the bag and take her to the hospital
* take care of the pregnant woman
* give her special medical treatment using the right medical tools
* take care of new born baby
* cut the cord, clean the nose, give injection, change diaper
* dress up the baby with different clothes and accessories
* share the newborn baby image with your friends
* play mini games

Today the hospital is crowded, and the women are waiting your help with their pregnancy.
Can you help this adorable mum in this adorable game ?

Newborn baby games - Pregnancy & Birth is a must have app for everybody. Features:
-entertaining and casual game
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-4 mini games to choose from
-help this woman to become a mother
-help the new born baby
-be the best obstetrician of the clinic
-a fun chance to learn, and get creative
-choose the most beautiful clothes and accessories
-lot of different fun activities to do in the hospital

Have fun with BATOKI !
developers: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
